scriptLines: select2 split(indicator=='Weekly new hospital submission per 100k' || indicator=='Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k']),
{new Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k-count} = {Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k-count},
{new Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k-count} = {Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k-count}
